ing: 1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
des: "These are easy no bake cookies that call for any flavor of INSTANT pudding, so you can get a variety of flavors to suit your particular taste."
ins:
Mix together the sugar, butter or margarine and the milk in a large pot and bring to a boil.  Boil for 2 minutes.
Turn off heat and add in the pudding, oats and vanilla.  Mix well and let stand for 5 minutes.
Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper.
